title: Energías Renovables Polo a Tierra S.A.S
subtitle: Corporate landing page for a renewable energy company
overview: Corporate landing page developed for a renewable energy company with the goal of establishing a professional digital presence and making it easier for potential clients to get in touch.
problem: The company did not have an online presence, which limited its commercial reach and reduced opportunities to receive contacts beyond its local area.
solution: I designed and developed a clear and functional landing page that presents the company’s services, strengthens its professional image, and enables direct contact from anywhere in Colombia.
my_role: Responsible for the complete design and development of the website, including structure, styles, content, and functionality.
key_features: Responsive design adapted for mobile and desktop devices
Clear sections focused on services and contact
Fast loading time and simple structure
business_value: The website allows the company to present its services professionally, improve visibility, and receive direct inquiries from potential clients.
learnings: I learned to work with real client requirements, prioritize clarity over technical complexity, and deliver a functional product aligned with business goals.

title: Password Generator
subtitle: Fullstack web application for secure password management
overview: Fullstack web application for secure password generation and management, built from scratch and deployed to production.
problem: Many users reuse weak passwords and lack a simple way to generate and manage them securely.
solution: I built an application that allows users to generate random passwords, store them securely, and manage them through an authenticated user account.
my_role: Fullstack developer. I implemented the business logic, backend, API, authentication, and frontend.
business_value: This project demonstrates the ability to build complete applications, handle authentication, protect user data, and maintain a functional frontend-backend workflow.
learnings: I learned how to structure an API, manage authentication, separate frontend and backend responsibilities, and deploy a production-ready application.

title: Space Shooter (In development)
subtitle: Arcade-style space shooter game for mobile and web
overview: Arcade-style space shooter game developed as a learning project to understand the fundamentals of game development using Godot Engine.
problem: The need to learn game logic, player controls, and the basic development workflow within a game engine.
solution: I developed a simple arcade game that implements core gameplay mechanics and supports both mobile and web platforms.
my_role: Game developer. I implemented game logic, player controls, and the overall project structure.
key_features: Support for mobile and web platforms
business_value: This project demonstrates self-directed learning, applied programming logic, and adaptability to new tools and environments.
learnings: I learned the fundamentals of game logic, scene organization, and the development workflow in Godot Engine.
